title: Syslog
description: JSON Schema for Log Analytics table: Syslog

CollectorHostName.description: Name of the remote device that generated the message.

Computer.description: Computer that the event was collected from.

EventTime.description: Date and time that the event was generated.

Facility.description: The part of the system that generated the message.

HostIP.description: IP address of the system sending the message.

HostName.description: Name of the system sending the message.

ProcessID.description: ID of the process that generated the message.

ProcessName.description: Name of the process that generated the message.

SourceSystem.description: The type of agent the event was collected by. For example, OpsManager for Windows agent, either direct connect or Operations Manager, Linux for all Linux agents, or Azure for Azure Diagnostics

TimeGenerated.description: Date and time the record was created.
